statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={197.2}{e}^{{{0.0293}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0293}}\approx{1.0297334681822}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0297334681822}-{1}={0.029733468182213}\approx{0.0297} and the percent is 2.97.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
